channel.title: [PI] Object Spawning
channel.description:
What I need to know is: How do i make the object being spawned spawn at a certain height level? I want to add a certain object to the second floor of a building and there is no z value to input in the spawn code. Right now i have
[code]c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2213, 2347, 3158, 2, 10);[/code] I noticed at the end of my the object spawns this code: [code]if (c.heightLevel == 0) c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2492, 2911, 3614, 1, 10); else c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(-1, 2911, 3614, 1, 10);[/code] Would I do something similar for this? Thanks lpxd

item.title: [PI] Object Spawning
item.dc:creator: @lpxd lpxd
item.description:
@lpxd wrote:

Fixed:)
I figured it out myself, but thanks for your help.
This in the normal spawning:

c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2213, 2347, 3158, 2, 10);

This at the end:

if (c.heightLevel == 1) c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2213, 2347, 3158, 2, 10); else c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(-1, 2347, 3158, 0, 10);

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Object Spawning
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

If you’re using the current code you are now, then it gets spawned at all the hight levels.
I guess you could do something similar to the code that you’ve shown, but it’s really unnecessary.

P.S. The PI object codes are:
objectID, objectX, objectY, facing, objectType

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Object Spawning
item.dc:creator: @lpxd lpxd
item.description:
@lpxd wrote:

What I need to know is:
How do i make the object being spawned spawn at a certain height level?
I want to add a certain object to the second floor of a building and there is no z value to input in the spawn code.
Right now i have

c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2213, 2347, 3158, 2, 10);

I noticed at the end of my the object spawns this code:

if (c.heightLevel == 0) c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2492, 2911, 3614, 1, 10); else c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(-1, 2911, 3614, 1, 10);
Would I do something similar for this?
Thanks
lpxd
